swarm.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a large group of insects, especially bees, moving together
swarm.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a crowd of people who are moving quickly
swarm.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Swarms of tourists jostled through the square.
swarm.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: if people swarm somewhere, they go there as a large uncontrolled crowd
swarm.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Photographers were swarming around the princess.
swarm.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: if bees swarm, they leave a hive (=place where they live) in a large group to look for another home
